name: Raid of Regions
description:
RAID OF REGIONS is a multiteam tactical shooter set on a future post war era. Every match is a heart pounding 4v4v4v4 battle between agents with customizable loadout, fighting together with their unique gears and advance gadgets. Upgrade your equipment during each game from obtained resources, collect intel to plan out your most effective strategy, and complete the operation objective!

KEY Features :
  • Race-to-two match : The first group to win two rounds wins the match!
  • 4v4v4v4 Multiple teams battle
  • Multi-purpose AI drone with the ability to scout and attack enemies.
  • Fully customizable loadout with gears and gadgets
  • Gear progression within each game
  • Collect intel to design the most impeccable plan

Visit our website to learn more!
